content:
I am trying to use the spreadsheets and the build process, but to have the extension.uri point to a url that does not begin with hl7
When I try to build, it fails, and tells me that "IG Name 'abc' is not registered in [igs] in fhir.ini". Creating a new category [igs] and adding abc to this does not fix the problem. Is there a way to build with a extension.uri that does not begin with hl7?
If you want to build an IG that doesn't use HL7, you can't use the HL7 publication build process. Instead, use the IG publisher jar.

Thanks Lloyd, I actually identified the IG route as the way to go. Forgot to remove this thread once I did.
Thanks once again for following up.
There's also an IG editor at simplifier, see http://docs.simplifier.net/docs_simplifier/simplifierIGeditor.html

Thanks @Vadim Peretokin
Unfortunately we are working with DSTU3 and, correct me if I am wrong, but simplifer is currently using DSTU2?
Yep it is at the moment. We're looking at upgrading to STU3
Great! We eagerly await that upgrade! Thanks @Vadim Peretokin
